Let's suppose 10 samples: 5 healthy salmons - 5 infected by a virus
12 genes: 6 showing differences - 6 indifferent

```{r}
simulate_indifferent <- function(){
  rnorm(10, 5, 1)
}

simulate_different <- function(){
  c(rnorm(5, 5, 1), rnorm(5,80,10))
}
```



```{r}
df <- data.frame(row.names = c("H1","H2","H3","H4","H5","S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5"))

df$TE21 <-simulate_indifferent()
df$AKN2 <-simulate_indifferent()
df$CTF3 <-simulate_indifferent()
df$GAN <-simulate_indifferent()
df$ZAM3 <-simulate_indifferent()
df$NAE1 <-simulate_different()
df$NEDD8 <-simulate_different()
df$COM9 <-simulate_different()
df$ADD3 <-simulate_different()
df$ERTS <-simulate_different()

```

```{r}
library("NMF")
```

```{r}
nmf_result <- nmf(df, rank = 2)
```

```{r}
fitted_result <- fitted(nmf_result)
```

```{r}
w<-basis(nmf_result) 
dim(w) #getmatrixH
h<-coef(nmf_result)
```

```{r}
#onlycomputethescores 
s<-featureScore(nmf_result) 
summary(s) #computethescoresandcharacterizeeachmetagene 
s<-extractFeatures(nmf_result) 
str(s)
```

```{r}
consensusmap(nmf_result,annCol=df,labCol=colnames(df),labRow=rownames(df))
```

```{r}
estim.r <- nmf(df, 2:6, nrun=10, seed=123456)
```

```{r}
plot(estim.r)
```
```{r}
consensusmap(estim.r,annCol=df,labCol=NA,labRow=NA)

```
